outputs.output_descr: The project will implement an International Programme of Electoral Research and Training through four defined strategies with direct partners that will cover the global, regional and national spheres. The implementation will be held through technical assistance missions for electoral authorities  in particular Latin America and the Caribbean; seminars, workshops and training courses; design and execution of electoral training programs at distance or by web pages; publications and exchange of experiences for South-South Cooperation.
outputs.output_title: Programa de Cap e Inv electora

project_descr: Programa Internacional de Capacitación e Investigación Electoral
project_title: Programa Internacional  de  Capacita e Invest Electoral
